title: SIC wins 'Cedant of the Year' award
text:
10 September 2015 01:36 CET SIC wins 'Cedant of the Year' award By Myjoyonline.com 
SIC Insurance Company Limited has won the Ghana Reinsurance Company’s 6th Cedants’ award night, held last Friday at the La Palm Royal Beach hotel in Accra. 
The Company was adjudged ‘Cedant of the year’ in the General business category for the year 2014 under review 
The Ghana Reinsurance Awards ceremony, “Cedants’ Awards Night” was established six years ago, to show appreciation to the local insurance companies for their diligent efforts, loyalty and support for Ghana Re and the industry as a whole. 
Under the theme, “Insurance – A tool for national development” the event recognises and reward companies which made notable contributions in the 2014 financial year’s performance towards the growth and profitability of the Company. 
Guest Speaker was Dr. Joyce Aryee, former Chief Executive Officer, Ghana Chamber of Mines and Chairman for the event was Hon. Mike Hammer, Chairman of the Board of Directors for SIC Insurance Co. Ltd. Also in Attendance was Mr. Simon Davor, Deputy Commissioner of Insurance, who represented the Commissioner of Insurance, Ms. Lydia Bawa. 
Present to receive the award on behalf of SIC Insurance was the Acting Managing Director of the Company, Mr. Kwei Mensah Ashidam who in an acceptance speech paid glowing tribute to the organizers for recognizing the efforts of hard working companies in the industry 
He dedicated the award to their cherished clients and customers for supporting the company’s growth 
Other companies that received award on the night included Metropolitan Insurance Company Ltd, Ghana Union Assurance Life Company and J.B Boda Reinsurance Brokers Pvt. Ltd
